entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 1:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
